com.espertech.esperio
Interface InputAdapter

All Superinterfaces:
Adapter
All Known Subinterfaces:
AdapterCoordinator, CoordinatedAdapter
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCoordinatedAdapter, AdapterCoordinatorImpl, CSVInputAdapter, JMSInputAdapter, OpentickInputAdapter, SpringJMSTemplateInputAdapter
public interface InputAdapter
extends Adapter

An InputAdapter takes some external data, converts it into events, and sends it into the runtime engine.

          Use for MapMessage events to indicate the event type name.
